item.title: links for 2008-04-22
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• “groovy mother” :: The book that is indirectly responsible for me getting my new job
    A few months ago, I was in the pub with a couple of geekchums. The topic of job interviews was going round the table, in part because I’d been talking about my goal of getting a job and moving to the Bay Area. Someone mentioned that they’d interviewed
    (tags: programming interview books career book Interviewing job hiring Jobs tips blog)
  • Vitamin Features » How to recreate Silverback’s Parallax
    Parallax scrolling is a psuedo-3D effect often used in side scrolling games to create depth. In this article Clearleft lead designer Paul Annett explains how he used the effect to great success on their newly launched Silverback site.
    (tags: css webdesign design parallax tutorial web development code cool tutorials tricks tools tips)
